there was once a minister to a great
king the king displeased with the
minister ordered him to be confined in
top of a very high tower this was done
in the minister was left there to perish
his wife came to the tower night and
called to her husband the minister said

tied the fine thread to one of his legs
of the beetle and put the honey in the
top of its head and let it go with its
head out the beetle slowly crept onwards

at last had reached the top of the tower
when the minister grasps the beetle and

lastly the rope the minister descended
from the tower by means of the rope and

the first benefit is health 99% of us do
not at all breathe properly we do not

breath will purify the body it quiets a
mind when you are peaceful your breath
is going on peacefully it is rhythmic if
the breath is rhythmic you must be
peaceful when the mind is disturbed the
breath is broken if you can bring the
breath into rhythm forcibly by practice
why can you not become more peaceful
when you are disturbed go into the room
and close the door do not try to control
the mind but go on with rhythmic
breathing for 10 minutes the heart will
become peaceful these are common-sense
benefits that come to everyone the
